**2022-10-12 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @andybons, @julieqiu**

**Accepted**

- **math/rand: seed global generator randomly** [#54880](https://go.dev/issue/54880)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net: Add ControlContext to Dialer** [#55301](https://go.dev/issue/55301)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **reflect: add Value.Equal, Value.Comparable** [#46746](https://go.dev/issue/46746)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/net/http2: Transport.MaxReadFrameSize** [#54850](https://go.dev/issue/54850)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **bytes, strings: \`TrimStart\` and \`TrimEnd\` replacing \`TrimLeft\` and \`TrimRight\`** [#54678](https://go.dev/issue/54678)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **net/http: add support for proxy basic authentication** [#55290](https://go.dev/issue/55290)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **sync/atomic: deprecate AddXxx, CompareAndSwapXxx, LoadXxx, StoreXxx, SwapXxx** [#55302](https://go.dev/issue/55302)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **time: add Ticker functions to affect the next tick** [#55129](https://go.dev/issue/55129)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **os/exec: add fields for managing termination signals and pipes** [#50436](https://go.dev/issue/50436)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **crypto/cipher: detached mode AEAD Seal/Open** [#24990](https://go.dev/issue/24990)

  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net/http:  Enabling support for HTTP/2 ORIGIN Frames RFC 8336** [#55121](https://go.dev/issue/55121)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
